Create a solar-powered farm that can provide electricity to a nearby community.
Build a wind turbine farm that can generate enough electricity to power a small town.
Develop a hydroelectric power plant that utilizes the flow of a river or stream to produce electricity.
Establish a geothermal power plant that harnesses the heat from the earth's core to generate electricity.
Create a biomass power plant that burns organic waste materials such as wood chips or agricultural waste to produce electricity.
